query: create or replace view `dfs`.`AAR  Views`.CLIENT_bc_grade_min_and_2nd_min as /* min and second min of BC grade  */ SELECT  t.appname, t.bcName, t.min_bc_grade, t.bc_grade AS second_min_bc_grade FROM (SELECT    bc.appname,   bc.bcName,    bc.bc_grade, MIN(bc.bc_grade) OVER(PARTITION BY bc.appname, bc.bcName) as min_bc_grade, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY bc.appname, bc.bcName ORDER BY bc.bc_grade ASC) as rank_bc_grade FROM `dfs`.`AAR  Views`.`CLIENT_BusinessCriteria_Grade` as bc ) as t WHERE t.rank_bc_grade = 2
